zone.line: [FULL PAGE SKETCH IN PENCIL WITH INK HIGHLIGHTS OF THREE BOATS
NEAR AN ISLAND CLIFF, WHICH HAS A CAVE OPEN TO THE OCEAN. THE
THIRD BOAT, WHICH IS SMALLER THAN THE OTHER TWO, SITS MIDWAY
BETWEEN THE ISLAND AND THE BOAT ON THE RIGHT. IN THE FOREGROUND
IS A ROCKY SHORE, AND IN THE BACKGROUND ARE HILLS.]
